name: fastdup
description: fastdup is a powerful, free tool designed to rapidly generate valuable insights from image and video datasets. It helps enhance the quality of both images and labels, while significantly reducing data operation costs, all with unmatched scalability.
readme_summary: fastdup is a Python-based open-source tool designed for analyzing image and video datasets. It focuses on data curation, duplicate detection, outlier detection, and visual search to improve data quality and reduce operational costs.
primary_use_case: Analyzing and improving the quality of image and video datasets by identifying duplicates, outliers, and other data quality issues.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a meticulous gardener tending to a vast orchard of data trees, each bearing fruit representing images and videos. The gardener, equipped with special lenses and tools, carefully prunes away duplicate branches and removes rotten fruit (outliers), ensuring only the healthiest data remains. A digital screen displays a map of the orchard, highlighting areas needing attention and showing the flow of data. The scene is set in a bright, futuristic greenhouse with glowing particles representing data streams. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and vibrant colors, subtly incorporating the 'fastdup' logo on the gardener's toolkit.

name: drinfo
description: A Linux CLI tool for physical and network drive information
readme_summary: drinfo is a command-line tool for Linux systems that provides information about physical and network drives. It displays disk usage with colored progress bars and human-readable sizes, offering detailed information such as mount point, filesystem type, and SMART status.
primary_use_case: Monitoring disk usage on Linux systems.
cover_image_prompt: A seasoned cartographer meticulously charting the vast landscape of a digital hard drive. The cartographer uses specialized tools to measure and map the different sectors, represented as colorful terrains ranging from lush green valleys (available space) to fiery red volcanoes (full sectors). A holographic display shows the drive's key statistics: capacity, used space, and file system type. The scene is set in a futuristic workshop filled with glowing monitors and data streams. The repository name, 'drinfo,' is subtly etched onto the cartographer's tools. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and crisp details.

name: tkforge
description: Drag & drop in Figma to create a Python GUI with ease
readme_summary: TkForge is a Python GUI creator that allows users to design interfaces in Figma and then convert those designs into Tkinter code. It simplifies GUI development by providing a drag-and-drop interface within Figma, streamlining the process of creating Python GUIs.
key_features: Easy to use drag and drop GUI maker
primary_use_case: Creating Python GUIs from Figma designs
cover_image_prompt: A blacksmith, representing TkForge, forging a glowing Python GUI from a Figma design blueprint. The blacksmith uses a special hammer that shapes UI elements like buttons and textboxes. Sparks of code fly from the forge, solidifying into a functional interface. A small screen displays the Figma design being translated into Tkinter code. The scene is set in a modern workshop with warm lighting and subtle digital elements. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: QGIS
description: QGIS is a free, open source, cross platform (lin/win/mac) geographical information system (GIS)
readme_summary: QGIS is a free and open-source Geographic Information System (GIS) software that runs on various platforms. It provides tools for spatial data management, cartography, and geospatial analysis, supporting a wide range of data formats and offering customization options.
key_features: Flexible and powerful spatial data management
primary_use_case: Geographic Information System (GIS) for creating, editing, visualizing, analyzing and publishing geospatial information.
cover_image_prompt: A cartographer stands at a large drafting table, meticulously assembling a giant jigsaw puzzle where each piece is a different map layer (satellite imagery, road networks, terrain data). As the cartographer fits the pieces together, a vibrant, detailed globe begins to materialize above the table, glowing with intricate details. Small UI elements float around the globe, displaying data attributes and analysis tools. The scene is set in a sunlit workshop filled with maps and charts. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with a warm color scheme.

name: ROMA
description: Recursive-Open-Meta-Agent v0.1 (Beta). A meta-agent framework to build high-performance multi-agent systems.
readme_summary: ROMA (Recursive-Open-Meta-Agent) is a Python framework designed to simplify the creation of high-performance multi-agent systems. It focuses on enabling hierarchical agent architectures, allowing developers to build complex systems with relative ease. The framework is currently in Beta.
cover_image_prompt: A master architect overseeing the construction of a towering city built from interconnected agent modules. The architect uses a holographic interface to arrange and connect the modules, creating a complex, hierarchical structure. Each module glows with a different color, representing its function within the larger system. Small screens display agent communication logs and performance metrics. The city is set against a backdrop of a vibrant, futuristic landscape. The composition is clean and focused, emphasizing the interconnectedness of the modules. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: codebuff
readme_summary: Codebuff is an open-source AI coding assistant that edits codebases through natural language instructions. It uses a multi-agent system to understand projects and make precise changes, coordinating specialized agents for tasks like file exploration, planning, editing, and reviewing.
key_features: Multi-agent system for code understanding and modification
CLI tool for installation and usage
primary_use_case: Automated code modification and refactoring using natural language commands.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled artisan meticulously sculpting lines of code from raw clay, guided by whispered instructions from a wise AI spirit. The artisan's hands shape the code with precision, while the AI spirit analyzes blueprints and offers suggestions. A small screen displays the Codebuff logo, subtly integrated into the artisan's workbench. The scene is set in a sunlit workshop filled with tools and glowing digital particles. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with warm colors and intricate details, conveying the seamless blend of human craftsmanship and AI assistance.

name: desktop-tui
readme_summary: The desktop-tui repository provides a text-based user interface (TUI) desktop environment, functioning similarly to tmux but as a complete desktop replacement. It allows users to run and manage applications within a terminal-based environment, offering features like shortcut configuration, window management, and custom commands.
key_features: Display any application or command that uses stdout
Can let the user select a file or a folder to use its path as a command argument
primary_use_case: Providing a functional desktop environment within a terminal, suitable for users who prefer text-based interfaces or need to run applications on systems without graphical support.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled typist sits at an old-fashioned typewriter, but instead of paper, the output appears as fully functional application windows arranged on a virtual desktop displayed on the typewriter itself. The typewriter keys glow softly, and digital particles flow from the keys to form the window borders and content. A small screen attached to the typewriter displays the repository name 'desktop-tui'. The scene is set in a cozy, dimly lit study with a single desk lamp illuminating the typewriter. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with warm colors and a focus on clear, understandable details.
